greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of exp( Sum_{n>=1} -A283498(n)/n*x^n ) in powers of x.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
mathematica: A[n_] :=  Sum[d^(d+ 1), {d, Divisors[n]}]; a[n_] := If[n==0, 1, -(1/n)*Sum[A[k]*a[n - k], {k, n}]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 17}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 11 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n==0, 1, -(1/n)*sum(k=1, n, sumdiv(k, d, d^(d + 1))*a(n - k)));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 09 2017
